name: Sudershan Singh
about: I'am a computer science graduate having 3 years of demonstrated corporate experience. Iam a self taught programmer and specialize in MEAN, MERN and Full stack development which involves nodeJs, ReactJS, Angular2+, expressJs and mongoDB. Currently working as associate consultant at Capgemini India.

skills.name: Vanilla Javascript
skills.description: Vanilla Javascript, often abbreviated as JS, is a programming language that conforms to the ECMAScript specification. JavaScript is high-level, often just-in-time compiled, and multi-paradigm. It has curly-bracket syntax, dynamic typing, prototype-based object-orientation, and first-class functions.

skills.name: Angular & React
skills.description: Angular is a TypeScript-based free and open-source web application framework led by the Angular Team at Google and React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components. It is maintained by Facebook.

skills.name: NodeJS
skills.description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, back-end JavaScript runtime environment that runs on the V8 engine and executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.

skills.name: npm
skills.description: npm is a package manager for the JavaScript programming language maintained by npm, Inc. npm is the default package manager for the JavaScript runtime environment Node.js.

skills.name: HTML & CSS
skills.description: Angular is a TypeScript-based free and open-source web application framework led by the Angular Team at Google and React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components. It is maintained by Facebook.

skills.name: Bootstrap
skills.description: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains CSS- and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.
